channel.title: Hard As A Rock Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: An alternative history podcast that tells the story of of the hardest men and women that ever lived.
channel.itunes:author: Shawn Kent
channel.itunes:summary: Hard As A Rock Podcast is a history show that tells the amazing stories of some of the hardest men and women that have ever lived. Each month military veteran and narrator Shawn Kent brings to bear his wit, cynicism and ironic sense of humour to tell the stories that made these men and women legends for all time. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store!
channel.description: Hard As A Rock Podcast is a history show that tells the amazing stories of some of the hardest men and women that have ever lived. Each month military veteran and narrator Shawn Kent brings to bear his wit, cynicism and ironic sense of humour to tell the stories that made these men and women legends for all time. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store!
channel.itunes:keywords: History, Men, biography, biographies, Ancient, Archaeology, Classics, Shawn, Kent

item.title: Hard As A Rock Podcast 001
item.itunes:author: Shawn Kent
item.itunes:subtitle: Bhanbhagta Gurung VC
item.itunes:summary: In the episode we tell the story that won Bhanbhagta Gurung the Victoria Cross. A remarkable story of heroism and courage from the Burma Campaign.
item.itunes:keywords: history, hard as a rock, Bhanbhagta Gurung, Bhanubhakta, VC, Victoria Cross, Burma, Nepal, nepalese

item.title: Hard As A Rock Podcast 002
item.itunes:author: Shawn Kent
item.itunes:subtitle: Capitaine Jean Danjou
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we tell the story of Capitain Jean Danjou and the French Foreign legions exploits at the Battle of Camarón in 1863.
item.itunes:keywords: history, hard as a rock, Capitain Jean Danjou, French Foreign Legion, Camarón, Mexico
